name: War on Ice
description:
A fast paced war-style card game inspired by ice hockey.

Rapid card-based action!
Crush your oppponent in single player or local multiplayer.

Bragging rights!
Keep track of your individual stats by playing online.

Always a winner!
Swiftly defeat your opponent in regulation, or drag it out to triple overtime.

Lady luck be kind!
Have a choice to make? Don't flip a coin, play a game of War on Ice!

Buy once, play anywhere!
Once you register your account, you can log in and play from any device or computer which has the app installed, or the online portal at https://play.waronicegame.com
